text: (nabiye!) sæma dutayekuma (tama janatavata) pæhædiliva vivaranaya kara pavasanu pinisa, ovunovunge janatavage bhasavan maginma (desana karana men) api ovunva yævvemu. (ema dutayin kopamana utsaha dæruvada, ovun karana pav pin valata sarilana se) allah adahas kala ayava væradi margayehi athæra damanneya. ohu kæmati vana (dæhæmi kriyavan karannan)va rju margayehi ætulu karanneya. ohu (siyallatama) balasampannayeku ha gnanavantayeku vasayen sitinneya
